page.title: 19COLLEGE OF FURTHER EDUCATION
page.content: peak period which is after 5pm.The sun beds cost Â£2.20 per half hour session. { NEWRY TECHNICAL COLLEGE} Newry Technical College was opened in 1969 and it takes students from the whole of the Newry and Mourne district.This stretches from Crossmaglen to Kilkeel.The College is also known as a College of Further Education and it takes pupils from the age of 16+.The pupils study business studies which include commercial and secretarial courses.There is also a department that deals with construction,this includes building technology.Another department deals with engineering.Another department deals with all aspects of catering.Students can also study community care which includes pre_nursing courses etc.Students can also study
